name: io.github.neilberkman/clippy
title: Clippy - Smart macOS Clipboard Tool
description: Copy AI-generated content to macOS clipboard. Handles text, code, files & recent downloads.

tools.name: clipboard_copy
tools.description: Copy text or files to clipboard. Use 'text' parameter for generated content (code, emails, docs). Use 'file' parameter only for existing files that need to be attached/uploaded.

text.description: Text content to copy - use for all generated content

file.description: File path to copy as file reference - only for existing files

force_text.description: Set to 'true' to force copying file content as text

tools.name: clipboard_paste
tools.description: Paste clipboard content to file or directory. Intelligently handles both text content and file references from clipboard.

tools.name: get_recent_downloads
tools.description: Get list of recently added files from Downloads, Desktop, and Documents folders.

prompts.name: copy-recent-download
prompts.description: Copy the most recent download to clipboard

arguments.name: count
arguments.description: Number of recent downloads to copy

prompts.name: paste-here
prompts.description: Paste clipboard content to current directory

examples.prompt: Write a Python script to process CSV files and copy it to my clipboard
examples.description: Generate code and put it directly on your clipboard

examples.prompt: Draft an email about the meeting and put it on my clipboard
examples.description: Create formatted text ready to paste into any email client

examples.prompt: Copy my most recent download to the clipboard
